title: President Biden Announces Presidential Delegation to Japan to Attend the Opening Ceremony of the Tokyo 2020 Summer Paralympic Games | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to Japan to attend events of the Tokyo 2020 Summer Paralympic Games and the Opening Ceremony on Tuesday, August 24, 2021.Mr. Douglas Emhoff, Second Gentleman of the United States, will lead the delegation.Member of the Presidential Delegation:Mr. Raymond Greene, Chargé d’Affaires ad interim, U.S. Embassy Tokyo###
